website_summaries.verdict: Superb safety, comfort, and convenience features. Easily one of the best Britax infant car seats around.
pros: Enhanced with shock absorbing SafeCell technology
Foam shell and generously cushioned headrest provide additional impact safety
European belt guide offers hassle-free installation without the base
cons: Fabric could be a tad softer

customer_reviews.title: Britax customer service = terrible
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this purchase. I have several britax items (3 strollers, 2 infant car seats, 2 marathons, 3 frontiers). I’ve also purchased several accessories. This car seat started to come undone within just a couple of uses. I contacted a britax for assistance and they said to just tuck the material back in. Hello?!! I tried that before I called and you put me through this whole process of sending an email with pictures and my proof of purchase! What a waste of time and money. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie R.

customer_reviews.title: Kept baby safe
customer_reviews.text: Kept my baby safe during a car accident. The base of the seat had some damage but the baby was perfectly protected. I immediately ordered an exact replacement. I’m thankful for Britax!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This seat is not cooler as insinuated
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I liked best about this product was the quality guarantee by Britax. I like the ease of securing the base into car and seat onto the base. However I was disappointed with the fabric that pulls out of tight fitting areas and the heat my son experienced in the seat. The fabric is said to be cooler by allowing more air to flow under the fabric. I did not find that to be true at all. Overall, I was very disappointed with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the stroller + car seat combo. So far, I am liking both. Had a tough time deciding between chicco and this brand. In the end, it is based on personal preference. Only problem would be taking the car seat out of your car from the base. If your car is small and the front seat is touching the rear car seat, it is difficult to take the car seat off from the base. You need some space for it to detach from the base. Apart from that, my wife and I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Metesh

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: This was for my new grandson. My daughter loves it. She stated this was the lightest one she has ever had and just thanked me for it. She has 3 other kids so she would know. She loves the material, the color, construction of it.
customer_reviews.author: suse541

customer_reviews.title: Does not securely fasten to car.
customer_reviews.text: Love how sturdy the car seats are. However we attempted to hook it up in a Saturn Vue and a Pontiac car and a Chevy truck all with the same result of its very flimsy it does not secure safetly to the seats with the given attachments therefore if you were to tap on the breaks the car seat bounces around. I am going to call the company tomorrow to see if they have a better model. I called my friend who just bought the same one and she tried it after I sent her a video and was very concerned as she said none of her other britax car seats have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We wanted it to work...
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved this seat! It was sturdy, felt secure and is so sleek and stylish. However, our baby hated it. I couldn’t get him to last in it at all. We ended up going with a convertible car seat when he was three months, much sooner than expected. Luckily we were able to return it. I think it was something about the straps. They always seemed tight no matter how we adjusted. It is also extremely heavy. I wouldn’t want to carry it around at all, which is also a reason we went up to a convertible. Much easier to get baby in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Simplest install ever
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I was looking for a more compact seat because I drive a Chevy Cruze and it fits super easy behind the passenger or driver seat! I love the easy to read levels in the base that let you get the install angle just right. The instructions in the manual are a quick read and make it very easy to understand installation and all the features of the seat. The only possible downside I can forsee is the canopy and the handle are very close together. My entire arm fits through just fine but my husband with bigger hands may be rubbing on the canopy and causing extra wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Novack

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: With the way the straps are connected to the head/body pillow it forces your baby’s head down. I ended up returning it after noticing my baby’s lips turning blue every time we would put him in it. I’ve had britax car seats with all my kids and am really disappointed in this one. I wouldn’t buy at all
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Car seat is great. Very well built, appears to be comfortable for our little one. We did notice that the baby seat does hold some heat and after a short time in the seat he does get warm. Not sire if itnis the material ir just because it is black and absorbs heat easier. Our vehicle has fairly dark tint in the rear so the sun isn’t an issue for him. Just be aware if this if you take a lasting more than an hr. or so.
customer_reviews.author: Lakotah

customer_reviews.title: Great seat. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Sturdy and reassuring that baby is safe. It is heavy though, which isn’t great for a postpartum women to carry. Small price to pay for safety.
customer_reviews.author: angela borggreen

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy but very safe
customer_reviews.text: It’s a heavier car seat than the Graco one we used with our other babies. However, he seems much more secure and sits lower in it, so it’s worth the extra weight. If your baby isn’t a tank like mine, it may not feel so hard to lug around. It locks securely into the base. Our baby is a bit hot-natured, so he’s often sweaty on his back when we get him out. We just make sure he has some air back there even when we have the heat turned on. I’m just pleased to see better head support in this seat, so it’s worth it for us.
customer_reviews.author: AmazoRN

customer_reviews.title: Terrible car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this infant seat thinking I was getting the best seat on the market as far as safety and comfort goes. However that is not the case. My son is 7lbs and the harnesses are just to big and can’t be adjusted for safety without marking his body. The head support also is lacking as his head has no support so his head and neck are flopping towards. The base also doesn’t seem secure as we tried installing it with both the latch system and seat belt and it still was movable. If I could return this seat I would but I missed the deadline by a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this one. Bought it specifically For the foot brace and the fact that it fits into our stroller choice very easily and securely. I’m on my 3rd baby over 10 years and they seem to have improved over time. I like the “foot piece” as it really jams up against the seat and secured the base. The car seat itself feels a little loose on the cradle but I’m getting used to it. Our girl was extra tiny and I recommend an insert to start. Fits well in the middle row of a Honda Odyssey.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have a second base
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have a second base. I would give it 5 stars but I find it annoying how expensive it is also that they upgraded the system so I could not use an old base from my brother (from 2 years ago) but instead was forced to buy a new one if I wanted to second base.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hess

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Comfortable, and Ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is reliable, comfortable, and ergonomic. Our 1 year old @ 21 lbs fits comfortably within the seat. We were really sold on the side-impact protection, as we have another baby due soon and will not be able to have the single car seat in the center of the rear seat. It fits perfectly with out Britax B-Free stroller. The only downside is that when you purchase an item from Britax, you're commited to the brand, as most of their products are not compatible with other strollers, car seats, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Over all amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! The adjustable base is an awesome feature. I never really consider how much that actually helps the baby to either raise up or lay flat. Britax did a wonder job with this seat. Plus it’s absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Abby D.

customer_reviews.title: It's Nice to Have an Extra Base!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this base for our Britax car seat because my husband and I both need the capability to do daycare drop-off and pick-up due to our sometimes-variable work schedules, and it made it so much easier to have a base in both vehicles. This base is sturdy, very easy to install, and super easy to use. The car seat simply clicks into when you set it on top, and easily releases by squeezing a lever and pulling up. While the car seat should come with a base (ours did, anyways), I highly recommend buying this additional base if you have someone transporting your baby on a regular basis, if for no other reason than convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best carseat.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful car seat with the best safety ratings. Is slightly heavier than some but that is due to being made well with top of the line material.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this as a secondary carseat for his vehicle. Compared to others we saw when deciding on a carseat, this was one of the more compact and lightweight models. Fits as expected in the vehicle, setup was fairly simple and the bright red color is an attractive option. Fit seamlessly within the Britax stroller we were gifted and, for the price and style, we are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Nice, safe car seat but narrow
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a well made sturdy car seat. I feel like it’s very safe especially with the steel frame. It was a bit heavy do to this though but acceptable. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because it seemed narrow for my daughter. I’ve owned a brittax car seat in the past and it seemed much more spacious then this one. I didn’t think my daughter would have much room to grow in this so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always Trust Britax
customer_reviews.text: I have used Britax with my first and upgraded to Britax Toddler seat, so now that we are expecting our second we decided to go with the exact same seat we used for our first love the safety features and love that it snaps right into the stroller for an easy and convenient travel system. We have also easily travel overseas with the car seat with no issues. We purchased the travel bag that has wheels on it perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy &Ali

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Safe
customer_reviews.text: This base works great with the B-Safe 35 infant carrier. It's thick and sturdy and the infant carrier clicks in and out with ease. I can say that I have no complaints on this product. When it arrived I did the shake test and was impressed with how sturdy it was and how well it stayed in place. If you plan on having baby in more than one vehicle and can afford purchasing an extra base I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ZeldaBarbie99

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use, very convenient. We have three bases; one for us, two more for both sets of parents. Easy to install, makes us feel like our daughter is safe in the car. We put her in the car seat inside the house, then click the seat into the base. I would recommend this to all my pregnant friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jenalyn Lorenzo Chin

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and very well made, heavy duty compared to other car seat we looked at. The padding feels very comfortable and sturdy - like its going to hold and support your baby. Its very easy to put on and take off the base. Easy to install in my car and my husband truck. I highly recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: AJBENNETT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing base, easy to use, safe!
customer_reviews.text: This was a second base we purchased so the wife has one in her vehicle and I always have one in mine. What I love most is that I can transfer my baby from the stroller to the car seat without having to wake him up. He simply snaps out of the stroller while in the seat, and clicks right into the car seat base. Life this because it doesn’t wake him up and we all know as parents, sleep is worth more than gold!
customer_reviews.author: lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Company doesn’t care about Children’s Safety
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. We bought the car seat and base at the store and decided to order another base for my husbands car on amazon, which was a mistake. You cannot tighten the base and the car seat is not locked in. I contacted the company and they will not allow me to return this even though we were never even able to use it because the fire personnel who tried to install told us it wouldn’t be safe to use. So now I’m out over $100 and cannot the base. Terrible company to work with. My advice would be to go with another company or buy everything from the actual store and not amazon
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Britax seats are literally the easiest seats I've ever installed (I've installed evenflo, graco, safety 1st, and cosco seats) its comfortable for my daughter and isnt ridiculously heavy either. Absolutely reccomend to anyone who needs an infant seat!
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Very safe but narrow
customer_reviews.text: I had heard so many great things about britax and I know it’s a great brand and very safe. One thing I really don’t like is how narrow this car seat seems, I feel like my son grew out of it so fast. I wish I would have known how narrow it is. For some kids it might be fine but not for chunky bigger boned babies. Also I wish there was more support by the head.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and safest
customer_reviews.text: Love love love ! I was sad that the black was out of stock but when I received this teal color ... it is absolutely beautiful. I love how it has the cooling material and it’s super easy to install and take off of base. It’s not huge and bulky. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Aric malberg

customer_reviews.title: Same as base that came with car seat, great for 2nd vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a second base for my husbands truck, so it’s only been used maybe three times and is currently not installed in the truck. But it works well, we anchor it to the seat and use a seatbelt to strap it down. If you have another base you will easily be able to install this one. But like almost anything it can be a pain. But nothing that can’t be figured out. I’ve used it with a Britax BSafe Ultra Infant car seat and it works fine and is exactly like the base that the car seat came with. I think it’s worth it if you even have the possibility of using two vehicles/grandparents/babysitter cars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I heard
customer_reviews.text: I really like this seat as it is spacious and the material is very cooling. The negative to this product is is sticks all time when trying to take it out of the base
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Heads up. Too Snug. 6 mos old @ 19 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good only up to 16 lbs. We still use it because I'm not spending another $300 on a car seat for a 19 lbs 6 month old that is squished in this seat. I took out the extra padding, still squeezing him in and out of this thing. Also, this carrier is so darn heavy. I'm 6' @ 210lbs and I hate lifting and carrying this thing compared to friends that have other brands that feel light as a feather. Just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: deanorbust

customer_reviews.title: Car seat base
customer_reviews.text: This was not easy to install - but once we got it in the car - we know we won't take it out. Bought several to put in the other cars the baby is in - since it was difficult to install - at least for us - but once installed - this is the easier baby car base I have ever had - easy to sit the car seat in and take out. Would recommend this - as if it was hard to install you know it is not going to come undone easily - probably not at all
customer_reviews.author: Noel Tullis

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat! My son left the hospital at 6lbs2oz and it fit him great and could definitely fit a baby smaller than he was. The design is my favorite it is way too cute! Installing was very easy I love the latch system on this seat. It's not as difficult as the Baby Trend I had with my daughter. It is a very sturdy carseat so it is a littler on the heavy side but I don't mind that. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Gepford

customer_reviews.title: Great for BOB stroller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I have a BOB stroller and this was the best option for a compatible infant carrier. The seat seems very solid and sturdy, but it is very narrow. I feel like the baby will outgrow it by 6 months, which isn't very much usage given the price. If I didn't need it for the stroller, I would probably go with a roomier infant carrier.
customer_reviews.author: TravelLoveHappiness

customer_reviews.title: Britax B-Safe 35
customer_reviews.text: We have a friend that works for AAA and we purchased this in addition to the travel system so we won't have to keep switching the base out between our 2 cars (highly recommend this investment if you have 2 cars). The install was super easy. It comes with 2 install systems: Latch and Seat belt. We are using the latch install system as we both have that available in our cars. Highly recommend Britax.
customer_reviews.author: NicoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Easy install on this time saver
customer_reviews.text: We love having these infant car seat bases in our vehicles. It makes getting our little one in and out so easy which saves a lot of time. And all parents know we need anything we can get to save time! Pretty easy to install as I was able to do it 8 months pregnant with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Carseat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use. So soft and seems comfy for my baby. I've always loved Britax. This is by far my favorite infant seat. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsier than expected with the base. Doesn't adjust as tight as I'd like and pretty manual. Base adjustment broke after four months of use. As of now, I've spent hours trying to even talk to a Britax customer service rep for replacement. Doesn't give me a good feeling with a car seat for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some good, some bad
customer_reviews.text: This carseat seems very safe and the print is adorable! It is extremely easy to install and use. Pretty easy to clean. Some things I don't like... my baby gets extremely hot in the seat and is not comfortable in it when we are not in the car and keeping the temperature very cool. It is heavier than other infant carriers I have used. It is wider than many carriers and hard to put in restaurant booths, down in carts, and in strollers that are supposed to be universal.
customer_reviews.author: MMMW

customer_reviews.title: The safest
customer_reviews.text: It is very safe. Baby lies a little deep, I believe it is safer, but I used to get concerned about his breathing at NB. Great to use without the support. It is a little hard to unbuckle the baby as well as the detaching mode from the stroller and the car support. I believe it is the most breathable in the market, but still a little warm for 30*C
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I used Britax car seats for my 3 youngest children and was always impressed with the durability so I bought this carseat for my daughter who is pregnant. The seat looks and feels very sturdy. It has a nice amount of padding compared to other carseats we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is that the seat is very heavy. Carrying it around is difficult. I might buy the attachable stroller simply to save my back. (I already have a stroller, but it doesn't connect to the seat.). Otherwise the seat is very nice and I love that it clicks in well.
customer_reviews.author: Squall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Nana!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a third car seat base for the Nana pickups from daycare; wish the price had been less, but as with the entire system, this one installs easily and works perfectly with the car seat! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Charlestonmutt

customer_reviews.title: Like it but fabric doesn’t fit all the way
customer_reviews.text: Got the stainless steel style one as I liked the color and it actually does help so my baby doesn’t sweat but out of the box the chair’s fabric is already too short and doesn’t fit in the frame well. Disappointed with the fabric not fitting all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Glendys Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, safety and light!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved all of our britax car seats and this is no exception. It is so light compared to others, about 8 lbs lighter!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Larsson

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: It was used, obviously repacakaged, probably returned after not being used. Original box was used but not well sealed and with no protective packaging. There were no instructions, warranty card, or other information inside. Otherwise it looks complete and easy. I just wish I had some documentation to confirm I have it installed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: William Jorth

customer_reviews.title: Installs very easily and quickly - either with the LATCH system or ...
customer_reviews.text: We already have the Britax B-Safe travel system. I needed an extra car seat base for my other car. This is the exact fit for that. Installs very easily and quickly - either with the LATCH system or using the seat belts. Takes less than a minute to install. Always a big bonus in my book for anything that saves time when you have baby. Compared with other brands which take upto 15 minutes to install and the same time to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Improper Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters new born . I am very happy with this product knowing baby will be safe
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love Britax car seats!!! Easy to install and safe for even a tiny baby. Our son only weighed 6 pounds and he fit perfectly in this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat company!
customer_reviews.text: We now have 3 of these bases and 2 of the Britax Bagile 35 car seats. They are fabulous. So easy to set up and use especially for first time moms, like me. Just listen for those 2 clicks, and make sure it’s lebel. Would definitely recommend. And the safety reviews are soo reassuring.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Barker

customer_reviews.title: $100 for a car seat base? really?
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is perfectly fine. It clicks into the latches in the back seat easily and sits there like it's supposed to. The price is the reason this gets 3 stars. I needed an extra base to use in our other car, but the cost is outrageous. Compared to the cost of the all-in-one carseat/base/stroller combo that we purchased for $300, the price of just this item is insane!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Idler

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This base works perfectly. I was able to cinch it down and it stays put. My only complaint is that it didn't come with its own metal belt tensioners to lock down the belt that holds this to the seat. You get a tighter hold using both of these together. A bit expensive if you are buying them for more than a couple cars.
customer_reviews.author: Blithe

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Britax carseat and they keep improving. This is a really good quality carseat, with nice features. The only drawback is that it is heavy. The heaviness is fine cause our baby feels really safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Twiggy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, expensive.
customer_reviews.text: The britax system is super easy to use and the baby thinks it is very comfortable (sleeps constantly in it) but the cost is prohibitively expensive. I would never have paid this much for the system but my wife got from her registry.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Britax B-Safe 35 Elite Base
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit to use in our other vehicle so we didn't have to move this around each time we changed cars. Great price on Amazon. Unit is easy to install, and having a second unit makes it much more convenient. Using this base versus just a seat belt looped through the carseat also seams more secure. When adjusted properly, we have very little side to side movement and up and down movement of our car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin TolentinoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Britax Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Well made car seat, comfortable for toddler and she likes it!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Beckner

customer_reviews.title: Safe seat, slightly heavy
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this car seat works great once your baby reaches the infant stage. I found that as a newborn my babies head was pushed forward with the padding of the car seat. I do love the material, we live in Florida and I have not noticed the baby sweating at all when in this car seat. The pattern of the fabric will leave marks on the baby, but it does not seem to bother her.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This seat is easy to use and works well for my baby who is growing steadily in the 5th percentile (tiny girl). I feel like she is really safe and snug. No issues at 9 months use.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hanson

customer_reviews.title: I’ve already had one from previous kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat so much that I bought another one for my new baby coming on Christmas. I sold my last one to a new mom in need of a car seat and then I got pregnant again. Good thing I still have the stroller! It makes everything so much easier. And I found all these great attachments for stroller on Amazon that I’ll be getting as well! LOVE LoVe LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: Ni
customer_reviews.text: We bought a used version to have as an extra in my husband’s truck. It came a little dirty/scuffed up but over all very functional. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jzehrung

customer_reviews.title: Eases Anxiety on Car Rides
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It’s so easy to simply snap the car seat into the base and you pull up on the lever of the car seat to get her out. She is so safe and I love thay the base actually anchors into the car. Only downside is that you have to pull the seat up a little more with whatever side the car seat base is on for it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy base, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Used with the matching care seat. Bought two bases so each parent has one. Very easy to use. Make sure to push down on the base when installing so it's as tight to the seat as possible with little slack in the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Car Seats for the Little People You Love!
customer_reviews.text: Britax car seats are great! I gave each of my daughters Britax car seats when they had children and I would highly recommend them! They are incredibly well made and the safety ratings are outstanding! The car seats for bigger kids are great too! You can’t go wrong with any of the Britax car seats!
customer_reviews.author: MissChris665

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat , perfect for britax stroller system
customer_reviews.text: For those with a britax stroller this provides the convenience of having to simply click it in and doubling as a stroller and car seat. This is our 3rd britax purchase and have yet to be let down. Fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Riktar

customer_reviews.title: Easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Baby fits very well, even as a somewhat smaller baby (7 lbs 8 oz). Bought coordinating infant insert support separately and didn’t really need it. Very easy to install compared to other infant car seats. Only downside is it’s heavy, but they all are so! Now if someone would make one with wheels like luggage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat. I am pleased with it 100%. I love how sturdy it is... I looked at car seats for a very long time and compared reviews and I came back to this one every time!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Once Installed
customer_reviews.text: The carrier snaps easily into place, and the base is a real asset. Our only complaint is that it requires some physical contortions to install correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Easy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great base. Clicks in and out with our car seat without ease. The clips are easy to click in as long as you have easy clips in your car. The ones in my husbands truck are a lot easier than my car because they stick out further. All in all, great base and works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, quality and safe. Don't get a solid color though
customer_reviews.text: I've loved Britax carseats for years and this one is what I expect from them. Quality and safe. Kicking myself for getting a solid black one though. Rookie mistake. Every little spit up and spot shows up and doesn't wipe away. Always they a patterned carseat
customer_reviews.author: Angie N.

customer_reviews.title: Good carseat
customer_reviews.text: Very good carseat for those who can handle extra weight. Well made. Not as padded as expected. Thinner than others. Cover does not go as far as one would want.
customer_reviews.author: AMB+AWG

customer_reviews.title: works but price?!?
customer_reviews.text: I needed a base for my car since I babysit my grandchild. It works but over 100.00 for this is ridiculous!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: auntevie

customer_reviews.title: Installation is slightly difficult, but LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely have lived this car seat, it is slightly difficult to install because the straps need so many adjustments made. Once it’s installed tho, it’s great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Bad JuJu
customer_reviews.text: My kid died in this seat, won’t buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: bill talbott

customer_reviews.title: You should be ashamed !!!
customer_reviews.text: Nasty ! Period ! Almost new HA HA!! Wish there was a no STAR BUTTONS !!!uughhh
customer_reviews.author: Jody Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this base
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat base, once you know how to use a car seat (in general) it’s incredibly easy & the markings are easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this base and the car seat that goes with it. Installs very easy. Has a level installed so you know if it's sitting right. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pibb

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase the used one because it was cheaper and I got really lucky because it looks brand new with all its packaging. Beyond that this is a great base that makes it super easy to mount the car seat and also release. I bought this extra one to have one in each car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to instal but lacks security
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, installs easy, but it doesn't secure the best. Maybe it's the seat but the play that's in the security point that locks in seems unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Catara Carrell

customer_reviews.title: Baby fits when she is installed right side up!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who just got out of the Marines and had a baby. I just wish they had a put a sticker on the side showing which end is up for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy lemon squeezy
customer_reviews.text: Best carseat we've owned hands down. So easy to use and click in and out of the car base. Equally easy to disassemble, wash, and put back together. It is definitely heavy, but I would take the ease of use anyday over the weight. Worth the investment! We're now Britax users for life!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price to keep baby safe
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and you can see its high quality. Fits my baby securely and he was born two weeks early.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great to have an extra base for other vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Bought this extra base for my grandsons car seat so we didn't have to keep switching the base.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Great infant car seat!
customer_reviews.text: The car seat came in and I really liked the fabric easy to wipe off. I had read reviews on this car seat for safety reasons and was glad to find it, and get it so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ollis

customer_reviews.title: Need a rental program for grandparents
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a visit from my new grandson from NY He was here for a week. Next time I see him he will have out grown his child seat. Recommend you have a rental program!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love Britax
customer_reviews.text: Two clocks, and you know Baby is secure. Easy to release the car seat from the base.
customer_reviews.author: AmazoRN

customer_reviews.title: Great infant carseat.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and his wife love the carseat for their newborn.
customer_reviews.author: basketball granny

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Was searching for a good seat for my new born this is easy to use have to buy the stroller afterwards for when he better bigger doesn’t look cheap easy on and off a little to heavy for moms but not for me dad
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: perfect but
customer_reviews.text: find me a car seat that is this safe but with stapes that don't twist!!!
customer_reviews.author: auntevie

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable. My major complaint is that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable. My major complaint is that the buckles that you have to attach to the vehicle are a pain to get deep into the safety latch in the vehicle itself. My hands have endured alot of stress and strain and I am physically fit, but this is an agravation to install and have to reattach from my daughters car to mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rubberb

customer_reviews.title: Very safe! Very heavy!!
customer_reviews.text: Like: necessary, meets requirements, federal standards; works well to keep Baby safe. Dislikes: very difficult to install; incredibly heavy, especially once Baby is several months old; have to struggle to get lower belt to snap into its locks every time. Baby hates it, but might hate all car seats which keep her restrained.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this carseat. We're due in October and couldn't find a better carseat we liked so we got this one. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Elder

customer_reviews.title: Bob Britax Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a second for my husbands car. Easiest install possible. Make sure you tighten in inner straps as much as possible. There is lots of slack
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it & the simple concept of removing seat & ...
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has the car seat & base for our 6th grandbaby, I am watching Sara while mom & dad work, so I bought the base & they leave the car seat & Sara every morning of week & I need to go somewhere, Sara can go with us. Love it & the simple concept of removing seat & replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: JKBF

customer_reviews.title: Transport made easy
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things about this stroller system. The base, car seat and stroller make bringing my little one places easy. The stroller folds up quickly and doesn't take up much space. It's also super affordable. Even my babies grandparents have found it easy to use. I would highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Stepharoozoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Small
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is small. Easy to install and use but small. My son is 3 months and I foresee him outgrowing this carseat by the time he's 9 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: Loveeee this car seat... the design, the safety features, and the weight of the car seat are all A+....... my newborn fits perfectly... will definitely recommend this car seat to all newborns
customer_reviews.author: Hair Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchasing this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Horrible car seat. The straps keep getting twisted. Baby is not comfortable in seat, and the seat keeps getting stuck on the base. I really regret purchasing this seat. And from some of the other views it sounds like they have horrible chat service
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the price of the carseat, I wish this base would be cheaper but it's something that you just have to have for multiple cars. This will be our second go round with britax which we love.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

product_meta.title: BRITAX B-Safe Endeavours Infant Car Seat - Rear Facing | 4 to 35 Pounds - Reclinable Base, 3 Layer Impact Protection, Circa
product_meta.description: Color:Circa| Style:B-Safe 35 EndeavoursThe Endeavours Infant Car Seat is designed for safety, comfort and mobility. Safe Center Latch makes it simple to secure the infant car seat base, while the rideshare ready European Belt Guide ensures safe installation without the base as needed. In the Endeavours Car Seat you are surrounded in safety with two layers of side impact protection plus the patented Britax SafeCell Impact Protection system. The SafeCell system includes a steel frame, energy absorbing base, V shaped tether to minimize seat rotation and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement in the event of a collision. An anti rebound bar minimize forces in the event of a crash by stabilizing the car seat. The Endeavours car seat is travel system ready using the Click & Go system and it's compatible with Britax B Agile, B Free, B Mobile and B Ready Strollers. This infant car seat can be used rear facing 4 35 pounds. Car seat dimensions 17.75 W x 25 H x 30.62 D inches. Child standing height 32” or less. Seat width 8.75”.
feature_bullets: Surrounded in safety: 2 layers of side impact protection, quick adjust head protection, steel frame, and impact absorbing base
Anti Rebound Bar: Minimize forces by stabilizing the car seat when installed rear facing
Ride share ready: European Belt Guide allows for installation without the base as needed. Child Seated Shoulder Height - 6.5 - 11 inches
Easy installation: Safe Center Latch or built in seat belt lock offs will secure the infant car seat base
No re-threading, ever: Quick adjust harness, 2 position buckle for a comfortable fit as your child grows
Relax & Recline: Spring assisted recline and indicators ensure the best vehicle installation angle
Travel system ready: Compatible with Britax B Agile, B Free, B Mobile, B Ready Strollers using the built-in adapters and with all BOB Single and Dual-lie strollers (Adapter sold separately)
Fits: Rear facing 4 to 35 pounds, seat area 13 D, 8.75 W inches; Dimensions 17.75 W x 25 H x 30.62 D inches
